text: @AprilDRyan @GovRonDeSantis @GovAbbott @dougducey is an Arizona COVID19 Disaster. June 12th we had 39,918 cases June 27th 70,052 cases. We are in "Surge Capacity"as of last night. Hospitals are moving Covid patients. Ducey is busy kissing Trump & Pence Ass.
